survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of online learning platforms to understand satisfaction levels, areas for improvement, and preferences in digital education tools.

questions.question_text: Which online learning platform(s) have you used in the past 12 months?
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture platform overlap. Include an 'Other' option for less common platforms.
questions.scripter_notes: Multi-choice checkbox list with an open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which online learning platform(s) have you used in the past 12 months?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall user experience of the online learning platform(s) you use?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency. Ensure the scale is balanced.
questions.scripter_notes: Single-choice radio buttons with a mandatory response.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall user experience of the online learning platform(s) you use?

questions.question_text: What is the primary reason you use online learning platforms?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option to capture niche reasons.
questions.scripter_notes: Single-choice radio buttons with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What is the primary reason you use online learning platforms?

questions.question_text: How often do you access online learning platforms?
questions.client_notes: Ensure the timeframes are mutually exclusive and cover all usage patterns.

script.question_text: How often do you access online learning platforms?

questions.question_text: Which features do you find most valuable in an online learning platform?
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to understand feature prioritization.
questions.scripter_notes: Multi-choice checkbox list with an open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which features do you find most valuable in an online learning platform?

questions.question_text: What is the biggest challenge you face when using online learning platforms?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option to capture unique challenges.
questions.scripter_notes: Single-choice radio buttons with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What is the biggest challenge you face when using online learning platforms?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your primary online learning platform to others?
questions.client_notes: Use a standard NPS-like scale for comparability.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your primary online learning platform to others?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for your primary online learning platform?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to gather qualitative insights. Place after key quantitative questions.
questions.scripter_notes: Open-text field with a character limit of 500.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for your primary online learning platform?

questions.question_text: Do you prefer self-paced courses or instructor-led sessions?
questions.client_notes: Simple preference question to guide content development.

script.question_text: Do you prefer self-paced courses or instructor-led sessions?

questions.client_notes: Standard demographic question for segmentation. Ensure age bands are non-overlapping.
